basics.label: Director of Finance
basics.summary: Dynamic, versatile, hands-on Program Manager who leads teams to design and implement successful IT projects that align business and IT objectives and deliver rapid results.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: PMO Start-Up | Contract Management | PMO Management Trusted Financial Executive with CFO- and CIO-level responsibilities; adds transparency to IT and financial operations while adapting financial strategy to organizational goals. Program Manager over all IT projects.
highlights: Spearheaded the development of the first-ever Program Management Office
Captured 60% savings in projects costs in only five months
Reengineered vendor policy to enhance quality assurance and to identify risks and issues at earlier stages during the project

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Off-Shore Project Management | Multimillion-Dollar Budgets | Global PMO Staff Top-performing Program Manager consistently sought out to reengineer troubled projects.
highlights: Managed PMO staff in a matrix reporting structure consisting of 44 Global Project Managers
Prescribed solutions that provided quick ROI for maximum revenue productivity, service optimization, and system flexibility
Directed programs with up to 70 infrastructure and application projects
Implemented vendor and financial strategies that improved project planning and reduced costs by 60% in only five months
